SELECT attachment_detail_new_name , product_name , product_author , COUNT(od.product_no) AS order_count FROM product p JOIN attachment a ON p.product_no = a.attachment_product_no JOIN attachment_detail d ON a.attachment_no = d.attachment_no JOIN ordered_detail od ON p.product_no = od.product_no GROUP BY od.product_no, d.attachment_detail_new_name, p.product_name, p.product_author ORDER BY order_count DESC LIMIT 0, 4;
